title: AWS Threat Detection to Azure Security Response: Advanced Threat Hunting and Incident Management
description: Master enterprise threat detection and incident response by implementing comprehensive AWS threat hunting and security response solutions, then migrating to Azure security response equivalents with advanced threat intelligence, automated response, and enterprise-grade security operations.
learningObjectives: Implement comprehensive threat detection and advanced threat hunting capabilities
Build automated incident response and security orchestration systems
Create threat intelligence integration and behavioral threat analysis
Design security incident management and forensic investigation workflows
Implement threat response automation and remediation capabilities
Build security metrics and threat landscape reporting frameworks
prerequisites: Completion of previous SCS-C02 labs or equivalent security experience
Strong understanding of threat detection methodologies and incident response frameworks
Experience with security operations and threat hunting techniques
Familiarity with forensic analysis and security investigation procedures
businessScenario: ThreatGuard Operations provides advanced threat detection and incident response services for enterprise clients requiring sophisticated security operations, threat hunting, and incident management. Their security response team needs expertise in threat detection, automated response, forensic analysis, and security orchestration. They must master both AWS and Azure threat detection platforms for comprehensive security operations excellence.

troubleshooting.issue: Threat detection false positives and alert fatigue in security operations
troubleshooting.solution: Implement machine learning-based alert tuning, use contextual threat analysis, implement threat intelligence enrichment, use behavioral baselines for anomaly detection, and implement risk-based alert prioritization and automated filtering

troubleshooting.issue: Incident response automation complexity and workflow orchestration challenges
troubleshooting.solution: Implement standardized response playbooks, use API-based integration for automation, implement error handling and rollback procedures, use workflow visualization and testing, and implement gradual automation with human oversight

troubleshooting.issue: Forensic investigation data volume and analysis performance
troubleshooting.solution: Implement intelligent data filtering and sampling, use distributed analysis capabilities, implement automated evidence correlation, use timeline compression techniques, and implement parallel investigation workflows
